12141.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: The ground grows slippery here as you reach the northern wall of the
crater.  Patches of oil, or something like it, lie on the ground.  As if
almost breaking your neck wasn't enough, something is moving over in the
shadows...

12110.name: Sliding Down the Crater
description: Just a little further until the crater flattens out enough for you to
walk normally.  Eww, what's that sme...  Looks like some poor sod wasn't
able to make it down this slide from hell.  A rotting corpse lies off to
your right, it's head nothing more than a smear on a small boulder.  It's a
good thing you were able to keep your balance reletively well.
The corpse looks a few days old, from the stage of decomposition. The young man looks like he must have been nothing more than a novice adventurer.

12164.name: A Spiralling Tunnel
description: The tunnel you are in spirals around down far into the planet.  The way
is lit by the green glow coming from the walls.

12180.name: {@In the Lifestream
description: You keep floating through the lifestream.  There isn't much of anything
around you, but below you is a large stone platform, much bigger than the
ones above you.

12173.name: {@In the Lifestream
description: You continue floating through the lifestream.  To your east is a small
platform made out of stone.

12155.name: A Dank Tunnel
description: This tunnel is very damp.  The moisture in the air muffles both sound and
light.  Thus it is very quiet here, as well as fairly dark.

12145.name: The Southwest Corner of the Cave
description: You see several peices of brightly glowing crystal sticking out of the
wall here, lighting up this area of the cave much brighter than the others.
The cave's floor seems to be going down a bit, or maybe they ceiling's going
up.  In any case, the ceiling seems to get taller to the east.

12101.name: A Smoldering Wasteland
description: The wasteland continues, but there is more snow and less rubble.  A
few small saplings are growing from the ground, but with the extreme
cold they probably will not last long.  The lip of the crater is
getting closer.  You can barely make out a faint green glow coming
from the north.

12127.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: The crater's walls tower above your head.  There isn't near as much
rubble on these slopes as there was at the entrance, but the nearly vertical
inclines would be nearly impossible to climb anyway.  To your east a green
light shoots from the ground, partly covered by a black cloud.

12112.name: Sliding Down the Crater
description: As you continue picking your way down the rubble on this steep incline, a
great boulder blocks your path.  Unfortunatly, you are unable to stop in
time to avoid smaking straight into it.  OUCH!  It looks like it will be
impossible to get down here, so you'd better move to the side to complete
your trip.

12170.name: A Dead End
description: The Spiralling Tunnel ends here with no exit apparent.  This room is very
brightly lit by the green glow from the walls.

12125.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: The crater streaches out to the north and west.  The lip of the crater
towers above your head to the south and east, with occasional rocks tumbling
down.  Let's just hope there isn't a real landslide...

12117.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: The vast grey desert of the crater streaches on endlessly to your north.
You glance fleetingly up to the lip of the crater high above you, and hear
several rocks clatter down the slope.

12120.name: The Bowl of the Crater
description: The apocalyptic landcape of the crater streaches out around you for what
is definatly too long a distance.  The utter emptiness of the place is
disturbing.  Also disturbing is the extremely noxious oder coming from the
east.  What in the world could that be?

12113.name: Sliding Down the Crater
description: After peeling yourself off of the boulder, you move off to the west to
finish the trip down the lip of the crater.  It isn't much further, so the
going ought to be pretty easy.

12153.name: A Dank Tunnel
description: This tunnel is dimly lit by the green light coming from the walls.  Water
hangs heavy in the air, decreasing visibility a great deal.  Brighter light
comes from below you, and you can hear voices echoing up.  You can't
understand what they're saying, though, due to the moisture muffling the
sound.

12126.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: The crater streaches off to the east for a great distance, with a faint
green glow coming from the ground about halfway across.  The lip of the
crater prevents you from going any other way.

12143.name: The Northwest Corner of the Cave
description: You stand in a large cave carved out of the ground under the crater.  It
looks like an animal did this, but it's much too big to be that.  The rocks
on the walls pulse with a green light that illuminates the cave.  Above you
is the exit back to the planet's surface.

12137.name: Near the Center of the Crater
description: Nearby, to the south, lies the source of the green glow that lights up
the crater.  A faint blue glow lies to the south and east, but it is almost
completely engulfed by the brighter green glow.

12176.name: {@In the Lifestream
description: The You float in the lifestream from one platform to another.  There is
one platform to your west, and another to your south

12115.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: The crater spreads out before you, a wasteland if ever there was one...
Or it should be.  Around you see tiny sprouts of plants starting to poke
back up, and you hear a cricket chirp in the distance.  It's comforting to
know that life can survive even in a place like this, but you must wonder
how it manages it.

12171.name: {@In the Lifestream
description: You find yourself floating weightlessly in the lifestream.  All around
you are platforms of rock floating in the stream with you.  Far below you
lies a particularly large platform.  You sense some movement coming from it.

12158.name: A Small Cavern
description: This small cavern looks a little beat up.  The walls have the same green
glow, but there are large pieces of the rocks shattered on the ground, and
large blackened areas on them.  It looks like a battle occured here very
recently.

12148.name: The Lair of Ultima Weapon
description: The room around you is huge and extremely brightly lit by the green glow
coming from the walls.  Large green crystals stick this way and that out of
the wall, and several small pools of a bright green liquid lie on the floor.

12150.name: Entrance to the Caves
description: You find yourself at the entrance to the layer of tunnels and caves
inside the planet.  Your way is lit by a bright green glow coming from the
very rocks around you.  There are tunnels off to the east and west, and you
can see back through the pit down from the surface to the grey thunderheads
above.

12142.name: Enterance to a Cave
description: You are in a tunnel leading down into the earth.  Below you you see a
cave with the same greenish glow that seems to everywhere in this crater.

12139.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: The lip of the crater lies to the north and east, blocking any hopes of
going that way.  To other directions there is little more than a field of
rocks.  The green glow lies off to the west, and is the only thing that is
remotely useful as a landmark.

12108.name: Sliding Down the Crater
description: You slowly and carefully pick your way to the west as you continue
sliding down into the Crater.  It's hard going at this point due to several
sharp points of obsidian rock sticking out of the ground at very dangerous
angles.  It would be far too easy to skewer yourself on one.

12175.name: On a Platform
description: You stand on a small stone platform floating in the lifestream.  The
lifestream and more platforms surround you.

12106.name: Sliding Down the Crater
description: You start your way down the steep incline on the inner lip of the crater.
Your full concentration is going exclusivly to not tripping on one of the
larger rocks, or getting your foot stuck in a pile of smaller ones.  One
false move, and you plummet headfirst down the lip, probobly breaking your
neck in the process.

12121.name: The Bowl of the Crater
description: Ugh.  That's all there is to be said.  A dark black fog issues from
cracks in the ground here.  Wherever it touches you it leaves a thin oily
residue.  You had better get away from this fast before you accidently
inhale some.  This stuff is eerie, and probobly isn't very good for you.

12179.name: {@In the Lifestream
description: You float through the lifestream.  You don't see any of the stone
platforms at this layer, but there is one right above you, and a large one
right below you.

12135.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: An unusual pile of rocks sits on the ground here.  Unusual both because
of the size, which is far larger than the pebbles coming down the walls of
the crater would be able to make, and because of the slight green tint to
the rocks.

12165.name: A Spiralling Tunnel
description: The tunnel you are in spirals around down far into the planet.  The way
is lit by the green glow coming from the walls.

12162.name: A Spiralling Tunnel
description: The tunnel you are in spirals around down far into the planet.  The way
is lit by the green glow coming from the walls.

12119.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: As you walk along the nearly vertical wall of rock preventing you from
leaving the crater, you see a strange symbol eched into the rocks.  It looks
almost like an airship.  Then again, it might just be your imagination
playing tricks on you.

12157.name: A Brightly Lit Tunnel
description: The tunnel continues, but the walls here are almost blindingly bright.
Large crystals extend from the walls, lighting the tunnel up like it was
day.  A green day, yes, but day.

12103.name: Climbing the Lip of the Crater
description: The going is hard here, it is very difficult just to stay on your feet.
Rocks clatter down around you threatening a landslide at any moment.  You
are already at the halfway point of this small mountain, though, so you
might as well finish the hike.

12124.name: The Bowl of the Crater
description: The ground here has a stangely blue tint to the normal greyness of the
crater.  To the north you notice a faint blue glow, but the tint of the
rocks couldn't be from that light...

12140.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: You arrive at the northern edge of the crater.  The lip of the crater
rises above you, almost completely vertical.  Climbing it would be suicidal.
How to get out of here...

12167.name: A Spiralling Tunnel
description: The tunnel you are in spirals around down far into the planet.  The way
is lit by the green glow coming from the walls.

12166.name: A Spiralling Tunnel
description: The tunnel you are in spirals around down far into the planet.  The way
is lit by the green glow coming from the walls.

12177.name: {@In the Lifestream
description: The Lifestream around you seems to be unusually thick here.  You can't
swing your weapon with any effectiveness here.  You also feel a healing
energy pulsing into your body from the lifestream around you.

12111.name: Sliding Down the Crater
description: You edge over a bit more to the east as the ground begins to flatten out.
As you look back up from where you came, you wonder how you're ever going to
get out of this crater.  You are quickly reminded that that isn't the
biggest of your problems when you find yourself tumbling down the rest of
the lip after one of your feet got stuck in a pile of pebbles.

12102.name: The Bottom of the Lip
description: You see the lip of the Northern Crater rising above you.  Some rocks fall
down the steep hill clattering around you.  It looks like anyone who wants
to get into this crater is going to have a tough time here.

12144.name: The Northeast Corner of the Cave
description: You are in a large cave inside the planet.  The whole place is bathed in
a soft green light coming from the walls of the cave.

12174.name: On a Platform
description: You stand on a platform floating about in the lifestream.  It looks like
there was a great battle here.  The corpse of Cid lies on the ground, dead
as can be.

12178.name: On a Platform
description: You find yourself standing on a small rocky platform floating along in
the lifestream.  More of the glowing green fluid surrounds you.

12169.name: A Spiralling Tunnel
description: The tunnel you are in spirals around down far into the planet.  The way
is lit by the green glow coming from the walls.

12109.name: Sliding Down the Crater
description: You are nearly done with this perilous trip down the inside of the
crater's lip.  Ahead of you the ground flattens out into something more
suitable for walking on.  The slide down is also getting easier, because
what were formerly pebbles and rocks are now numerous grains of grey sand on
the floor, providing a much easier surface to slide down.

12138.name: The Bowl of the Crater
description: The grey desert is interrupted here by what seems to be a large pile of
black cloth.  It rustles slightly as you approach.  You quickly look around,
but the only interesting things nearby besides the cloth are the blue glow
to the south-east and the green glow to the south-west.

12146.name: The Eastern Side of the Cave
description: To your north and west lie the rest of the cave, and to the south lies a
tunnel.  The tunnel ends a ways down, but you can't make anything out at the
end because of the bright green light coming from it.

12156.name: A Fork in the Trail
description: Two very different tunnels meet at this point.  To the east the tunnel is
filled with a green light to rival the sun, and to the north there is barely
any light.  Below lies more tunnel, this more moderatly lit.

12161.name: A Spiralling Tunnel
description: The tunnel spirals off to the north, the way lit by the green glow from
the walls.  Above you is the entrance to this downward-spiralling tunnel.

12130.name: The Center of the Crater
description: There is a huge hole in the ground here.  A {@bright green light{0 shoots
from the ground.  It's intensity should hurt your eyes, but somehow you find
it stragely soothing.  You can hear faint voices echoing up from far down
the pit, but cannot tell what they're saying.

12128.name: The Bowl of the Crater
description: You almost feel like yawning from the utter sameness of the crater around
you.  The only interesting thing from here is the black cloud to the east
that is barely letting a green light through it.

12152.name: A Dank Tunnel
description: This room's walls seem to be a bit less bright than many other rooms'.  A
dampness in the air stifles your breathing.  The tunnel to the east leads
back to the entrance, and to the south the tunnels continue.

12151.name: The Western Tunnel
description: This tunnel leads west, away from the entrance to the caves.  The walls
glow with the same green glow that seems to be everywhere in these caves.

12129.name: Near the Center of the Crater
description: A black vaporous cloud envelops you.  It's hard to see through it, and
it's beginning to gag you.  There is another cloud like this to the south,
but something's different about this one.  And vaguely menacing...

12105.name: The Edge of the Summit
description: Here starts a long slide down the inner lip of the crater.  There is
nothing but rubble on the steep incline, so it looks like you won't be
getting back up.  From down in the crater comes a stong smell of something
burning...

12163.name: A Spiralling Tunnel
description: The tunnel you are in spirals around down far into the planet.  The way
is lit by the green glow coming from the walls.

12172.name: {@In the Lifestream
description: You continue floating through the lifestream.  To your south is a stone
platform.

12159.name: A Tunnel
description: There is nothing partucularly interesting about this tunnel, if you don't
count the green glow coming from the walls, which is pretty standard around
here.  Below you is a small cavern that seems strangely darker than the rest
of the tunnels.

12154.name: A Large Cavern
description: You step into a large cavern filled with a green light.  Of course, some
is coming from the walls, but the entire north wall is made of a
green-tinted crystal that is radiating quite a bit of light.  You see
Aeris's body embedded in the crystal.  The light in the crystal seems to be
pulsing outwards from her, and, if you didn't know better, you would think
she just smiled.

12181.name: {@In the Lifestream
description: You continue floating about in the lifestream.  Below you is a huge stone
platform.

12147.name: A Dark Tunnel
description: You are in a dark tunnel leading from the cave to...  Somewhere.  The
green glow is all you can see to the south.

12114.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: The huge bowl of the crater spreads out to the north, the landscape
barren and rocky.  Whatever caused this must have been huge.  You can see a
green glow coming from the center of the crater.
A small note has been left on the ground here.

I would like to dedicate my first area, The Northern Crater, to Shator. Without his advice and critisism this place would be a lot more boring. I would also like to thank Niss for letting me build on his mud.
Thanks for reading this,
Hojo the Mad Scientist

12168.name: A Spiralling Tunnel
description: The tunnel you are in spirals around down far into the planet.  The way
is lit by the green glow coming from the walls.

12122.name: Near the Center of the Crater
description: You are nearing the center of the crater now.  To the north a green light
shoots out of the ground, and to the east there seems to be an unnatural
black cloud.  You can smell the cloud from here, and the vapors from it burn
the back of your throat.

12132.name: The Bowl of the Crater
description: As you continue walking through the crater, you suddenly stop in your
tracks as you see a pillar of {4blue light {0rising into the sky.  When you
finally take your eyes off of the pillar in front of you, you notice another
strange phenomenon.  A sign floats in the air with the word EXIT written on
it in red light.

12182.name: {@In the Lifestream
description: You're still floating about in the lifestream.  Below you is a large
stone platform, and above you is a small one.

12116.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: The crater is huge.  That's the only proper word.  You begin to feel an
irrational fear that whatever it was that caused this crater might just come
back, and you'll have no way to get out of it's way in time.  You look
nervously back at the top of the lip of the crater, knowing full well that
there is no way you're going to be able to walk out of this crater.  It's a
terrifying feeling.

12133.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: As you continue your trek through the crater, you come upon an odd hill
blocking your way.  As you walk over it, your foot suddenly slips in and is
sucked down into what formerly seemed like solid rock.

12107.name: Sliding Down the Crater
description: You slide a bit over to the east as you continue sliding down the lip of
the crater.  Suddenly you slip as your foot catches on a large rock!  You
plummet several feet, but luckily you catch yourself after a couple of
inadvertant flips.  You got away with a few bruises this time, but next time
you may not be so lucky.  Better watch your step a bit more carefully...

12160.name: The Eastern Tunnel
description: This tunnel leads east away from the entrance to the caves.  The walls
glow with a pulsating green light, which seems, strangly enough, to be
perfectly matched with your heartbeat.

12136.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: More rubble surrounds you as rocks tumble down from the hights of the
crater's wall.  It would be very unfortunate, although fairly likely, for
your head to be smashed in by one of the larger rocks tumbling down towards
you.

12123.name: The Bowl of the Crater
description: The crater streaches on as far as the eye can see, the most boring
landscape imaginable.  Snow and rocks make up the scenery.  The only
interesting things you can make out are the {@bright green glow{0 to the
northwest and the {4faint blue glow{0 to the northeast.

12104.name: The Top of the Lip
description: You feel a shortness of breath as you reach the summit, both from lack of
oxygen and the breathtaking scenery surrounding you.  The crater is huge,
streching out for miles away from you.  The grey expanses to your south are
nothing compared to the crater.  The crater is the same rubble and snow that
the plains to the south were, but from a pit at the center of the crater
comes a bright green glow.  The summit streaches on a bit more to the north,
then drops off suddenly into the crater.

12183.name: The Large Platform
description: You are standing on a large stone platform at what seems to be the bottom
of the lifestream.  You can see other small platforms above you, but you
can't seem get off of this one.

12134.name: A Small Overhang
description: You stand underneath a small overhang of rock coming out from the
lip of the crater.  The rock overhead looks like it might fall at any
moment, as cracks are readily visible and some small pieces of it are
missing.  It might not be the smartest of ideas to stay here for long.
Recent cave-ins have forced portions of the eastern wall to rupture
and break away revealing an ancient structure from where it lay
entrenched for countless eons.

12131.name: Near the Center of the Crater
description: This area is bathed in a strange turquoise glow coming from the mixture
of the blue glow to the east and the green glow to the west.  It creates a
very...  Odd effect indeed.  It's a nice color, though.

12118.name: The Edge of the Bowl
description: The vast bowl of the crater streaches out before you.  The grey horizon
is broken only by the green light coming from the center of the crater.  The
lip of the crater towers above you, but there is no way you could make it up
that slide of loose rocks alive.

12100.name: A Smoldering Wasteland
description: A rough, barren landscape streaches out around you.  Rubble covers most
of the ground, and a light layer of snow on top of that.  Any vegetation
that might have once been here is certainly gone now.  To the north you can
see the lip of the crater.

12100.name: the huge wolf~
description: The wolf is huge, much larger than even the biggest of it's species. It also glows with a very faint green light.
12100.room_name: A giant snow wolf lunges towards you!

12101.name: The bunny~
description: The bunny radiates a soft green light from it's otherwise snow white fur. This is very, very odd...
12101.room_name: A brightly glowing bunny hops around.

12102.name: Ultimate WEAPON~
description:
Ultimate WEAPON is the planet's strongest defense against any and all threats against it. It is a huge, hulking creture
 that looks like it could kill you by looking at you. It's eyes glow with the {@brightest green {0you have ever seen.
subroutines:
F vul FI
F par X
M death 12100 100~
M fight 1804 50~
12102.room_name: Ultimate WEAPON stands here, taking up nearly the whole room.

12103.name: Rufus~
description:
This is Rufus, president of Shinra Inc. He took over when his old man died, and has been ruling over Shinra with an iron fist ever since.
He wears a suit covered by a white trenchcoat, and carries a large shotgun.
12103.room_name: A tall young man in a white coat stands here.
12103.keywords: rufus tall man young white coat~

12104.name: Heideggar~
description: Here stands Hiedeggar, a fat ugly man in a bad suit.
12104.room_name: A fat man in a bad suit stands here.

12105.name: Master Tonberi~
description: A strange little man stands here holding an equally small black book. A strange star floats above his head.
12105.room_name: A strange little man in a black robe stands here.

12106.name: The armored golem~
12106.room_name: A huge stone golem stands here.

12107.name: The Dragon Zombie~
description:
It would appear on a quick first look to be a normal dragon, but when you look at it for a moment you notice that large chunks of flesh are hanging off of it's body, 
It's belly is bloated, and it's claws are covered with a green, gangrene-like slime.
12107.room_name: A huge dragon with large peices of flesh rotting off stands here.

12108.name: Red XIII~
description: It looks at first glance like an ordinary wolf with unusually red fur. When you look closer, however, you see a fierce intelligence in his eyes.
12108.room_name: A large wolf with a reddish tint to it's fur stands here.

12109.name: Yuffie~
description: A young oriental-looking girl stands here holding a large weapon. It looks like it could be thrown or used as an axe.
12109.room_name: A young girl stands around. What's she doing here?

12110.name: Jenova Death~
description: You see a being that has the upper body of a woman and the lower body of something like a squid. It is extremely repulsive.
subroutines:
F vul FI
F par PQUVX
12110.room_name: A huge, freakish tentacled woman floats here.

12111.name: Cloud Strife~
description: Here stands Cloud Strife. His hair spike stands up in all of it's blond glory, and strapped to his back is his nailbat: a particularly nasty weapon.
subroutines:
M death 12100 100~
M fight 1801 75~
M fight 1804 40~
M fight 12111 7~

12112.name: The mud monster~
description: It's almost a human shape, but it's made of mud, and it's dripping all over the place, including on you.
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
12112.room_name: A creature made of nothing but mud attacks you!

12113.name: {8The black cloud{0~
description: The cloud is jet black, nearly blinding you as it envelops your body...
subroutines:
F for AHMV
F par ABCDEFGHIJK
12113.room_name: {8A black cloud floats towards you, and envelops you!{0

12114.name: The Clone~
description: At first it looks like it's just a pile of black cloth, but then you realize that it's alive when it tries to kill you.
12114.room_name: A pile of {8black cloth{0 leaps on top of you!

12115.name: The Gigas~
description: A giant muscular creature of some sort stands here looking very dull, but deadly anyway. His muscles bulge, and veins are clearly visible under his skin.

12116.name: The bunny~
description: The bunny has an odd pink glow to it's fur, which sets it apart from the other greenish bunnys hopping around the crater. It carries a large drum and a large mallet. It also has on a very un-bunnylike pair of Ray-Bans.
12116.room_name: A brightly glowing bunny hops around.
